job_title: Bilingual Spanish Editorial Agent in Springfield, MO
pros: Challenging opportunity on the translation, editing and formatting of the MA program.

review_title: I am an adjunct professor at GU who benefits regularly from the dedication of the GU team.
pros: Flexibility, creativity, cultural diversity are just a few of the "pros" in working with Global University. The staff is great and the support for faculty is outstanding.
cons: The course material is not always as up to date as I would wish and the ability to utilize the online services for faculty could stand a more user-friendly interface.

review_title: Very pleasant place to work, great God loving people!
